Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.rowkey

Contains classes to build row keys for HBase.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RowKey Implementing this interface allows an entity to represent a rowkey.
 

Class Summary
AutoIncRowKey Representation of the rowkey associated with the auto-incremented count of tables being stored
ColumnsRowKey Rowkey for Columns row type
DataRowKey Representation of the rowkey associated with data row content
IndexRowKey Super class for index rowkeys
IndexRowKeyBuilder A builder for creating IndexRowKey instances.
IndicesRowKey Represents an index metadata row in HBase.
PrefixRowKey Super class for rowkeys that only occur once, ie, rowkeys that are shared across all tables.
RowsRowKey Representation of the rowkey associated with the row count details for the tables being stored
SchemaRowKey Representation of the rowkey associated with the table schema details for the tables being stored
TableIDRowKey Super class for rowkeys that occur once per MySQL table
TablesRowKey Representation of the rowkey associated with the metadata details for the tables being stored
 

Enum Summary
SortOrder Specifies the order of the index to be built.
 

Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.rowkey Description

Contains classes to build row keys for HBase.
